txt.en: The Taurogrim have taken over an area of Eryn Lasgalen called Tholkát. Thorlind has asked you to cleanse this area of their evil, including their accursed dens.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. I will ensure that these vermin are routed from our realm.'
Thorlind can be found near Tholkát.\n\nYou should talk to Thorlind.
Taurog-dens can be found in Tholkát, in northern Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should destroy Taurog-dens in Tholkát.
'It seems the Taurogrim have built their dwellings here in Tholkát. They must be destroyed if this place will ever heal to its former splendor.'
